name: Into The Bunker
description:
Kill zombies and escape the dark bunker!

This game is a top-down shooter where you play as somebody who needs to escape their bunker which has become overrun with zombies. You can only see within the light of your flashlight, and you need to collect batteries to keep your flashlight powered. Each floor has a locked door which must be opened in order to reach the next floor. Each door can only be unlocked with a keycard. Keycards and batteries can be dropped by zombies.

Controls: Arrow Keys = move,  A/D = rotate,  Space = shoot,  ESC = quit.

Made in Godot for the NOKIA 3310 JAM #3
